properties.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Northern Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:36PM PST until January 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches
expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will cause areas of
blowing snow.

* WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains/East Humboldt
Range.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on
slippery road conditions. Gusty winds Saturday afternoon could
lead to blowing snow causing significantly reduced
visibilities.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY
